info.titleen: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour.
info.descko: 엄마의 생일선물을 고민하는 남자친구를 위해 여자친구가 제안한 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: which is very-very weird, because she never calls me
sentense.ko: 그게 정말 이상하단 얘기야 엄마는 절대 전화를 않하거든

sentense.en: Carol moved her stuff out today.
words: 물건, 물질, (빽빽히) 채워 넣다, (재빨리, 되는대로) 쑤셔 넣다

sentense.en: Let me get you some coffee.
